Text:
Hello Mr Smoker. Thanks for the up - most appreciated. Also thanks for DB 'Milk and Honey'!!! Album, I would advice to anyone interested in good reggae.

 I have been scanning the internet after B.B Seaton's Anthology and you cant really buy it at this point. If you have it hidden in your reggae drawer could you please make an up. It would be Great! 

All the best, man!!!
